books.author: by Todd Burpo with Lynn Vincent
books.description: A 3-year-old’s encounter with Jesus during an appendectomy; the basis of the movie.
books.name: HEAVEN IS FOR REAL

books.author: by Thomas Piketty
books.description: An analysis of centuries of economic history predicts worsening inequality.
books.name: CAPITAL IN THE TWENTY-FIRST CENTURY

books.author: by Michael Lewis
books.description: The world of high-frequency computer-driven trading, from the author of “Liar’s Poker.”
books.name: FLASH BOYS

books.author: by Elizabeth Warren
books.description: The Massachusetts senator describes her life, her academic work and her battle for a consumer protection agency.
books.name: A FIGHTING CHANCE

books.author: by Robin Roberts with Veronica Chambers
books.description: A memoir by the “Good Morning America” anchor discusses her struggle with breast cancer and a rare blood disorder.
books.name: EVERYBODY'S GOT SOMETHING

books.author: by John Elder Robison
books.description: A life with Asperger’s syndrome; first published in 2007.
books.name: LOOK ME IN THE EYE

books.author: by Diane Keaton
books.description: The actor discusses aging, beauty and her personal style.
books.name: LET'S JUST SAY IT WASN'T PRETTY

books.author: by J. B. West with Mary Lynn Kotz
books.description: Reminiscences by a former White House major-domo. First published in 1974.
books.name: UPSTAIRS AT THE WHITE HOUSE

books.author: by Laura Hillenbrand
books.description: An Olympic runner’s story of survival as a prisoner of the Japanese in World War II.
books.name: UNBROKEN

books.author: by Edith H. Beer with Susan Dworkin
books.description: The story of a Jewish woman in 1930s Vienna who, with the help of friends, moved to Munich, hid her identity and married a Nazi Party member, thus saving her life.
books.name: THE NAZI OFFICER'S WIFE

books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: The host of "The O'Reilly Factor" recounts the events leading up to Jesus' execution.
books.name: KILLING JESUS

books.author: by Sheryl Sandberg with Nell Scovell
books.description: The chief operating officer of Facebook urges women to pursue their careers without ambivalence.
books.name: LEAN IN

books.author: by Dan Harris
books.description: A co-anchor of "Nightline" reports on the science and spiritual dimensions of meditation and how it has improved his life.
books.name: 10% HAPPIER

books.author: by Arianna Huffington
books.description: Personal well-being as the indispensable third measure — with money and power — of success.
books.name: THRIVE

books.author: by Katherine Boo
books.description: A journalist's National Book Award-winning report on families striving for better lives in a Mumbai slum.
books.name: BEHIND THE BEAUTIFUL FOREVERS
